Record.definition: CREATE OR REPLACE EDITIONABLE PROCEDURE "PPM"."CMN_SESSIONS_INS_ID_SP" ( P_USER_ID IN NUMBER, P_TOKEN IN VARCHAR2, P_CREATED_BY IN NUMBER DEFAULT 1, P_ID OUT NUMBER ) IS BEGIN SELECT CMN_SESSIONS_S1.NEXTVAL INTO P_ID FROM DUAL; INSERT INTO CMN_SESSIONS ( ID, USER_ID, TOKEN, CREATED_DATE, CREATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_DATE, LAST_UPDATED_BY ) VALUES ( P_ID, P_USER_ID, P_TOKEN, SYSDATE, P_CREATED_BY, SYSDATE, P_CREATED_BY ); END;
